## K-means clustering with Iris dataset 

This report presents the end product created through the final course project for Developing Data Products.

## Data used

```{r cars, echo = TRUE}
summary(iris)
```


## Application overview

- Different clusterings can be identified by selecting the X and Y parameters
- Clusters can be adjusted via the Cluster Count parameter
